gnu.rfb.server
Interface RFBServer

All Known Implementing Classes:
VNCConsole, VNCDesktop, VNCFrame, VNCJFrame, VNCPixels, VNCRobot
public interface RFBServer

To be implemented by RFB servers, which must also define a constructor that accepts an integer (for the display number), a string (for the display name), and then two integers (suggested width and height).
